name: R08's Adventure
description:
R08 is an energetic robot that wants to run around the city, but the city is full of dangers. Help R08 enjoy his run in one piece.

All assets used for this game were obtained from the itch.io and Unity Asset Stores.

Credits

  • Core game mechanics by Michael Baker
  • Level design and enemy/hazard scripting by Angel Argandona
  • low poly futuristic city assets by niko-3d-models
  • LowPoly Robot by quaternius
  • SCI-FI Modular Pack Free by 256px
  • Free Cyberpunk Music Loops by Telemechanical
  • Industrial Catwalk Kit by Luke Smith
  • Unity Particle Pack 5.x by Unity Technologies
  • FREE Cyberpunk Vol. 1 Music Pack by Future Ramen
  • Loop & Music Free by marching dream
  • Robo's turret (free sample) by RoboCG
  • Unity Samples: UI by Unity Technologies
  • WarZone Sci-Fi Turret pack by VDGames
  • Free Music Bundle by neocrey
